DOC.detailed_description: A randomize control multi-component fall prevention study old adult . The study integrate fall prevention exist community-based public health program old adult . The study evaluate effectiveness fall prevention intervention among 552 senior attend Preventive Health Care Aging ( PHCA ) clinic two county : urban San Diego county rural Humboldt county . The intervention include four element : education fall risk factor , referral community exercise program increase strength balance , medication review , home modification reduce home hazard . The goal intervention reduce incidence fall require hospitalization 10 % . Results study , expect complete October 2004 , help guide future effort develop multifaceted fall prevention program .
